title: Lucky Jars and Broken Promises
description: Penelope Kingston is absolutely certain that her stall at the school fete will be a huge success. She and Oscar are in charge of the lucky jars, and Penelope wants to break last year’s record.This is even more important because Penelope’s dad is coming to the fete, and she and her brother don’t see him very much these days. Penelope could nearly burst with excitement! If she can make her dad proud, maybe he’ll want to spend every weekend with Penelope and Harry.She just has to make sure everything goes perfectly . . .
author: Chrissie Perry
